LanguageData.ABE.Hospitality: The Hospitalty-mod is loaded. It overrides the visitors-event so this mod will not ask for visitor-groups.
LanguageData.ABE.GenericGroup: A group of pawns are approaching. You cannot see what faction they are but you can signal to them. Do you want so signal them to go away, come back later or let them enter?
LanguageData.ABE.TraderCaravanArrival: A trade caravan is approaching. You cannot see what faction they are but you can signal to them. Do you want so signal them to go away, come back later or let them enter?
LanguageData.ABE.CaravanArrivalTributeCollector: A trade caravan is approaching. They seem to be an Empire tribute collector. Do you want so signal them to go away, come back later or let them enter?
LanguageData.ABE.TravelerGroup: A group of travelers are approaching. Do you want to signal to them to choose another way or can they pass through your area?
LanguageData.ABE.VisitorGroup: A group of visitors are approaching. Do you want so signal them to go away, come back later or let them enter?
LanguageData.ABE.Title: Select what types of visitors should ask before entering
LanguageData.ABE.Traders.Tooltip: All traders using the vanilla trading-logic
LanguageData.ABE.TributeCollector.Tooltip: The royal tribute collector from the Empire
LanguageData.ABE.Visitors.Tooltip: Visitor groups wanting to spend some time at the colony
LanguageData.ABE.Travelers.Tooltip: Traveler groups passing through your area
